question: This state launches the Sankalp Seva bus service to connect 6,000 villages of the state.
explanation: Uttar Pradesh government launched Sankalp Seva bus service of 50 buses to connect as many as 6,000 villages. Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath flagged off the buses in function at Lucknow. On this occasion he announced to construct 'Gaurav Marg Path' to honour the sacrifices of the martyrs.
